A version of '''[[Minecraft Infdev]]''' was released on '''April 13, 2010''', at 19:53 UTC. It was announced, bundled with [[Java Edition Infdev 20100413-1951|the previous version]], on [[The Word of Notch|TWoN]] at 19:59 UTC<ref>[[wordofnotch:518911403|Infdev update, time to sleep]] – The Word of Notch, April 13, 2010</ref>. The changes in this version are not known.
